title: Get $45 to spend when you get this $65 Costco Gold Star Membership
content:
Macworld

Where are you going to do all that holiday shopping? Instead of hopping from one place to the next, burning through gas and still maybe not finding everything you need, check Costco. Not a member? That’s great! That means you can get your 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership for the same price as everyone else, but you also get a $45 Digital Costco Shop Card, and it’s still only $65. If you’ve been a member before, wait until the end. We’ll tell you how you may still qualify. 

Here’s how it’s going to go. 

First, get your Gold Star Membership here through StackSocial. Important: make sure to provide a valid email address. Within two weeks of redeeming your membership, you’ll get your $45 Digital Costco Shop Card in your inbox. Once you have it, you can use it however you want. Make purchases in person at a Costco warehouse or online. Costco has a pretty extensive online selection, so make sure to check that out. 

Now, if you used to have a Costco Gold Star Membership but let it expire, you may still be able to get this deal. If it’s been expired for over 18 months, then you’re in the clear. 

Either way, just make sure to redeem your Gold Star Membership by January 31, 2025. 

So, who wants to find out how many hotdogs and sodas $45 can buy!

This is your last chance to get a 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership and a $45 Digital Costco Shop Card for $65. 

 

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + $45 Digital Costco Shop Card – $65

See Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
